profile.name: Eduard-Mihai Burtescu
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Coursera | Exploring Rust Systems Programming & Contributing to Open Source Projects
profile.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented software engineer with a strong passion for Rust systems programming. With over 3 years of experience in contributing to various open source projects, I have developed a unique blend of technical skills and expertise.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed and maintained multiple Rust-based systems programming projects, including a safe and concurrent language.
Contributed to the Nix Packages collection with high-quality code and documentation.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable and efficient software solutions.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed and maintained multiple open source projects, including rustc-guide, rust-log-analyzer, gll, llvm-project, fish-shell, highfive, measureme, glOOF, rfcs, rust-ar, odht, rust-reduce, bug-cargo-overlapping-crate-names, rust-gpu, sobek, unicode-general-category, rustybuzz, vkrunner, nixpkgs, makepad, abel465-rust-gpu-nixos-example, and cprep.
Participated in various hackathons and coding challenges to improve problem-solving skills.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained multiple open source projects, including rust-log-analyzer and gll.
Contributed to the development of new features and bug fixes.

experience.title: Shell Scripting Enthusiast
description: Developed and maintained multiple shell scripting projects, including a custom shell emulator.
Participated in various coding challenges to improve problem-solving skills.
